questions:

A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A family gathering

B) A squirrel
C) A bird
D) A person

B) A bench

D) A building

B) Fallen leaves and grass
C) A playground
D) A mountain

A) Yes
